Hi All,

I am new to Heritrix and need information on how to move the settings 
from Heritrix-1.21.1 to Heritrix-2.0.
I have order.xml of Heritrix-1.21 and need equivalent settings for 
Heritrix-2.0.

Kindly let me know where to start on this.

--Thanks and Regards
Vaijanath
